verses.text: \w After|strong="G3326"\w* \w these|strong="G3778"\w* \w things|strong="G3778"\w*, \w there|strong="G2532"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w feast|strong="G1859"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w went|strong="G2424"\w* \w up|strong="G1519"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2414"\w*.

for an angel went down at certain times into the pool and stirred up the water. Whoever stepped in first after the stirring of the water was healed of whatever disease he had.\f + \fr 5:4 \ft NU omits from “waiting” in verse 3 to the end of verse 4.\f*

\w A|strong="G2192"\w* \w certain|strong="G5100"\w* \w man|strong="G5100"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w there|strong="G1563"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w had|strong="G2192"\w* \w been|strong="G1510"\w* sick \w for|strong="G1161"\w* \w thirty-eight|strong="G5144"\w* \w years|strong="G2094"\w*.
